post_title: NLFS or trade T206 Vic Willis Bat Piedmont Factory 42 nice crease free card
post_content:
Hey all,
I keep thinking I want to make a run at the P42 set, but gotta focus on knocking out the HOF backs line first!

Nice crease free card, strong ink, but does have some old album lines on the back.

Off to SGC now, Zelle, PayPal or folding $$$ works fine.

Would consider trading for SGC 3-4.5 of the following:
Sam Crawford either pose

Thanks,
Bob
